name: SANTA CLARA VALLEY WATER DISTRICT
sampleDescriptions: Issues lobbied to support tax exempt status for water conservation rebates, tax code leg for IPR, DPR, and Public Private Partnerships (P3s), maintaining tax exempt status of private activity bonds, a
Lobbied support of flexibility with financial assurance mechanisms (and not requiring endowments), streamlining of permit processes, and other regulatory and permitting issues.
Lobbied for general support for water quality, recycled water, dam rehab and amendments to water infrastructure and finance innovation act (WIFIA).
Lobbied for US Army Corps of Engineers' projects sponsored by the SCVWD.
